title: Maharani Kundan & Emerald Bridal Haaram Set with Jhumkas
features: Intricate Kundan setting showcasing exquisite floral and paisley motifs. The Haaram features a central pendant with a cascading design, complemented by pearl drops. Matching Jhumkas echo the necklace's motifs, culminating in a single pearl drop. Traditional 'Nakshi' work is evident in the fine detailing.
colors: with vibrant green emeralds and soft white pearls creating a regal contrast.
occasions: or any occasion demanding a statement piece of timeless elegance.
description: This Haaram set is a masterpiece of Hyderabadi craftsmanship. The use of high-quality Kundan and emeralds, combined with the intricate design, makes it a valuable heirloom piece. Its traditional design holds cultural significance while the modern execution ensures timeless appeal. Durability guaranteed with robust gold setting.
